text: very decent school.Nice field and dedicated teachers.Most of people are friendly except a few.The landscape could be better.As an alumni,I would say I had a very great experience with the programmes scheduled there.I enjoyed sec 1,2 and 4 the most as I had a very fun time bonding with everyone.I miss this school.

The uniform vendor for this school is not keeping stock.. since school start my child want to get 1 more uniform, always no stock, keep asking to come next day but still until today no stock..even online is no stock.. vendor is Shanghai uniforms... My other children school got no issues.. only here..
My Primary school tiling is better than this school, they have no budget to buy tiled floors and instead their floor is concrete. disappointing

Great neighbourhood school with a  new principal is relatable and not make us suffer by putting HBL on Friday instead of random days like the old system. Furthermore there's programmes too e.g.  'Discovery Week' or camp each year, outside school picnics to celebrate national hols, and lo hei during CNY etc. Also there are entertainment facilities like ping pong tables, Basketball tables, Tchoukball idk table and board games available for free, which are easily accessible. Canteen food are not too bad which are priced much cheaper than outside food.

Overall it isnt quite a competitive/ vigrous academic environment and you can chill and have fun  most of the time. Students are alright though, nothing crazy. He teachers are great too, dedicated to teaching and friendly to students.
